Role: The main clock source for the AD-JUPITER-EBZs.
Notes: Sources the reference clock and the Multi-chip Synchronization signals.

Role: The platform for the Holoscan implementation.
Notes: Samples the incoming signals and performs the digital signal processing.

Role: The platform for the Matlab implementation.
Notes: Samples the incoming signals and performs the digital signal processing.

Role: The carrier board for the RF-SOM.
Notes: Provides the necessary interfaces and power for the ADRV9009-ZU11EG RF-SOM.
